import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import {faStar} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import {AppendToday} from '../Utils/AppendDay' const CompetitionHeader = ({fixtures}) => { const [date, setDate] = React.useState(Date()) const [month, setMonth] = React.useState(Date()) const [year, setYear] = React.useState(Date()) return (
{fixtures.length && fixtures.map((fixture, index) => { return (
{fixture.league.country} {fixture.league.name} - {fixture.league.round} {AppendToday}
00:00
teamOne
0
teamTwo
0
) })}
) } export default CompetitionHeader
